overview: Desire takes hold when Blake discovers that her new roommate, Yhivi, is exactly the kind of lover that she's always longed for. Melissa's passionate relationship hits a major roadblock when she tells her girlfriend that she wants to have a baby. A practical Blair and a free-spirited Lyra prove that when it comes to sex, opposites do attract. Rachael and Charlotte enjoy one last heated encounter before they call their relationship quits.
title: A Lesbian Romance 3
